design.custom_css: .custom-logo { display: none !important; } .site-links, .header-md { display: none!important; } ion-row { display: -webkit-flex; display: -ms-flexbox; display: block !important; width: 100%; height: 95vh; } .custom-page ion-col { padding: 0; height: 1; height: 50%;; } .custom-page .dark-content ion-card.menu-card { background-color: #387ef5; height: 5; min-height: 100% !important; height: 100% !important; } .custom-page .menu-card .card-subtitle { font-size: 3em; font-size: 6vw; position: absolute; top: 55%; } .custom-page .menu-card .card-title { position: absolute; top: 18%; font-size: 5em; font-size: 25vw; width: 100%; font-weight: bold; opacity: .7; } .custom-page .dark-content ion-card.menu-card { background-color: #c72128; } .ion-page ion-content, .ion-page ion-list .item { color: #ffffff; background-color: #273038; } .custom-page .dark-content { background-color: #273038 !important; }
